src:
VIDEO: Kakšna packa! To je storila vsem na očeh
Prisotnost potnikov je ni motila.
03 Nov 2019, 07:11 by N. B.
Po spletu je zakrožil posnetek dekleta, ki je na vlaku enostavno spustila hlače in opravila malo potrebo.Po poročanju portala LiveLeak se je neokusen pripetljaj, ki je šokiral vse, zgodil nekje v Švici. Ljudje so bili verjetno še toliko bolj začudeni zato, ker ima večina vlakov ali pa vsaj železniška postaja na voljo tudi toaleto, kjer bi lahko opravila svoje.Kako so se odzvali potniki na vlaku, si oglejte v spodnjem videu.
text:
VIDEO: What a duck! She did it to everyone's eyes
The presence of passengers did not disturb her.
03 Nov 2019, 07:11 by N. B.
A clip of a girl who simply dropped her pants on the train and did a little needing work was circulating online. According to LiveLeak, a flashy event that shocked everyone happened somewhere in Switzerland. People were probably even more astonished by the fact that most trains, or at least the train station, also had a toilet where they could do their job.
